title: Instagram automation
description:
Instagram Graph API setup for automated Reel posting.

Guide: docs/instagram-api-setup.md

Steps:
1. Switch IG to Creator/Business account (5 min)
2. Create Facebook Page + link IG (5 min)  
3. Create Meta Developer App + permissions (30 min)
4. Generate tokens + get IG User ID (15 min)
5. Test API post (10 min)
6. Build instagram_upload.py script

Video specs match our YouTube Shorts - no changes needed.
Token refresh: every 60 days (can automate).

title: Real Multi-LLM Council — Perplexity Integration + Live API Calls
Move home directory projects and caches to /srv (1.8TB drive)
description: Move remaining large directories from ~/home to /srv (1.8TB SATA). Prior work (Feb 7) already migrated 51GB (caches, toolchains, 8 projects). Remaining: delete .cache-old (15GB), migrate .local (3.2GB), .claude (2.5GB), .clawdbot (281MB), go/ (39MB). Pattern: rsync to /srv/home/{cache,projects,toolchains}/, symlink back. Design doc: docs/plans/2026-02-09-srv-migration-design.md
close_reason: Migration complete. Deleted .cache-old (15GB), migrated .local (3.2GB), .claude (2.5GB), .clawdbot (281MB), go/ (39MB) to /srv. 20 symlinks verified, all toolchains passing. NVMe freed 20GB (173→153GB used).
